reviewText: A personal note from the seller was included....very nice.  It replaces one destroyed by water, and since I am in it, wanted it for my grand kids.
In the age 80's Just Say No! This PSA starred the biggest stars of the time. Granted this movie is highly laughable, but it's also quite perfect for its time. Good watch.

This shows how drugs can affect, not only the person who uses them but the entire family as well.  It shows the different ways parents behave in order to protect their kids or when they feel helpless... and it shows how the kids who are on drugs deal w/ life, how powerless they are over drugs and how everything goes downhill while they are on that stuff.  It also shows the ways they can overcome the addiction and lead a better life.  It's a good tape to watch, to inform kids of what can happen if you start using drugs.
